name: dffun6
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Alternate definition of a function using "at most one" notation. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)
